alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 1:52PM MST until February 15 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Tonto Basin, Mazatzal Mountains, San Carlos, Globe/Miami and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
